programme.title: American Traitor
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Eccentric, brilliant lawyer James Laughlin (Al Pacino) boldly accepts the case to defend American entertainer Mildred Gillars (Meadow Williams) from ten counts of treason charged by the US government regardless of the inevitable backlash from his country. During WWII, Mildred became a powerful weapon in the hands of the Nazis and was forced to sing defeatist war propaganda to US soldiers based in Europe. Terrorized and raped by Joseph Goebbels, Hitlers right-hand man, Mildred broadcasts hate-filled messages in order to survive the dark and dangerous world of the Third Reich. Despite attempting to murder Goebbels, Mildred is eventually captured by American authorities and sent to trial where, against all odds, Laughlin struggles to redeem her reputation and maintain his own.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: Science fiction movie. Canadian sci-fi, produced in 2017. A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

programme.title: House Of
programme.desc: Trapped in a deserted house, nine people must play a deadly game of survival.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson star in this riveting saga of a veteran Marine who becomes the scapegoat for a mission that went tragically wrong. Faced with murder charges in a case thats been rigged against him, Col. Terry Childers (Jackson) turns to a former brother-in-arms (Jones) to defend him and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy) is a long-time "cooler" at the Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas: he is paid to bring his black cloud to any table where a gambler is on a roll. But when Bernies luck starts changing for the better--thanks in part to a pretty cocktail waitress--he suddenly loses his cooling talents, incurring the ire of the casino owner in the process.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: American drama, produced in 2004. An American, French, German, Italian, Rumanian, and British co-production. The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Absentia
programme.desc: Tricias husband Daniel has been missing for seven years. Her younger sister Callie comes to live with her as the pressure mounts to finally declare him "dead in absentia." As Tricia sifts through the wreckage and tries to move on with her life, Callie finds herself drawn to an ominous tunnel near the house. As she begins to link it to other mysterious disappearances, it becomes clear that Daniels presumed death might be anything but "natural." The ancient force at work in the tunnel might have set its sights on Callie and Tricia ... and Daniel might be suffering a fate far worse than death in its grasp.

programme.title: Slackers
programme.desc: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the colleges most popular girl.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Pa asmeni skrejošais
programme.desc: Losandželosa, 2019. gads. Riks Dekards ir "pa asmens smaili skrejošais" - policists un atlīdzību mednieks, kura uzdevums ir atrast četrus androīdus-replikantus, kuri nelegāli atgriezās uz Zemes un meklē savu radītāju.

programme.title: ALL the OLD KNIVES
programme.desc: CIP aģents Henrijs no sava vadītāja Vika saņēmis uzdevumu slēgt kādu astoņus gadus senu nolaupīšanas lietu, kas beigusies ar traģēdiju. Vikam radušās aizdomas, ka toreiz CIP rindās bijis kāds nodevējs, kurš vainīgajiem nopludinājis informāciju un traucējis glābšanas operācijai. Lai noskaidrotu patiesību, Henrijs ir spiests sazināties ar savu bijušo kolēģi un mīļāko Sīliju, kura tiek turēta aizdomās, jo nākamajā dienā pēc traģēdijas pameta CIP rindas. Izmantojot vairākas perspektīvas, laika grafikus un intervijas, Henrijs, Viks un Sīlija mēģina atšķetināt pagātnes notikumus. Galvenajās lomās: Lorenss Fišbērns, Kriss Pains, Tandive Ņūtone

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Sniegainā Igaunija

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Pa asmeni skrejošais
programme.desc: Losandželosa, 2019. gads. Riks Dekards ir "pa asmens smaili skrejošais" - policists un atlīdzību mednieks, kura uzdevums ir atrast četrus androīdus-replikantus, kuri nelegāli atgriezās uz Zemes un meklē savu radītāju.

Pirmais pasaules karš, Rietumu fronte, diviem jauniem britu kareivjiem tiek dots praktiski neizpildāms uzdevums - nokļūt ienaidnieka aizmugurē, lai nogādātu ziņojumu, kas ļautu izglābt ievērojamu skaitu kareivju no drošas nāves.

programme.title: ALL the OLD KNIVES
programme.desc: CIP aģents Henrijs no sava vadītāja Vika saņēmis uzdevumu slēgt kādu astoņus gadus senu nolaupīšanas lietu, kas beigusies ar traģēdiju. Vikam radušās aizdomas, ka toreiz CIP rindās bijis kāds nodevējs, kurš vainīgajiem nopludinājis informāciju un traucējis glābšanas operācijai. Lai noskaidrotu patiesību, Henrijs ir spiests sazināties ar savu bijušo kolēģi un mīļāko Sīliju, kura tiek turēta aizdomās, jo nākamajā dienā pēc traģēdijas pameta CIP rindas. Izmantojot vairākas perspektīvas, laika grafikus un intervijas, Henrijs, Viks un Sīlija mēģina atšķetināt pagātnes notikumus. Galvenajās lomās: Lorenss Fišbērns, Kriss Pains, Tandive Ņūtone

programme.title: Pa asmeni skrejošais
programme.desc: Losandželosa, 2019. gads. Riks Dekards ir "pa asmens smaili skrejošais" - policists un atlīdzību mednieks, kura uzdevums ir atrast četrus androīdus-replikantus, kuri nelegāli atgriezās uz Zemes un meklē savu radītāju.

Pirmais pasaules karš, Rietumu fronte, diviem jauniem britu kareivjiem tiek dots praktiski neizpildāms uzdevums - nokļūt ienaidnieka aizmugurē, lai nogādātu ziņojumu, kas ļautu izglābt ievērojamu skaitu kareivju no drošas nāves.
Ādams ir 27 gadus vecs, talantīgs un veiksmīgs radio žurnālists. Vizītē pie ārsta puisis uzzina, ka viņam ir reta vēža forma, kas ir bīstama 50 % gadījumu.

programme.title: Skārdnieks, drēbnieks, zaldāts, spiegs
programme.desc: Balstoties uz klasisku stāstu ar identisku nosaukumu, filma stāsta par Aukstā kara gadiem 20.gadsimta vidū. Džordžs Smailijs - bijušais spiegs - tiek noalgots no valdības puses. Ir aizdomas, ka Britu izlūkdienastam ir dubultspiegs.

programme.title: Non-Stop: tiešais reiss
programme.desc: Transatlantiskā avioreisa Ņujorka_Londona laikā ASV aviācijas policijas priekšnieks Bils Marks saņem vairākas īsziņas ar prasību pārskaitīt 150 miljonus dolāru uz kādu ārzonu kontu. Pretējā gadījumā tiek draudēts ik pēc 20 minūtēm nogalināt kādu pasažieri. Kad atklājas, ka konts ir atvērts uz paša Marka vārda, viņš tiek turēts aizdomās par lidmašīnas nolaupīšanu.
Ādams ir 27 gadus vecs, talantīgs un veiksmīgs radio žurnālists. Vizītē pie ārsta puisis uzzina, ka viņam ir reta vēža forma, kas ir bīstama 50 % gadījumu.

programme.title: Normāls trips
programme.desc: Sekojot četriem draugiem, kuri ceļo pa Ķīnu, meklējot vienu no savām bioloģiskajām mātēm. Visi satuvinās un atklāj patiesību par to, ko nozīmē zināt un mīlēt sevi.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Artemīda"
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi risinās tuvā nākotnē kādā nelegālā slimnīcā Losandželosā, kur slepus ārstējas pilsētas nežēlīgākie noziedznieki. Slimnīca, kas slēpjas aiz viesnīcas Artemīda izkārtnes, ir miera osta ļaundariem, taču viss mainās, kad iestādījuma vadītāja Džīna Tomasa atklāj, ka viens no pacientiem patiesībā te atrodas ar mērķi nogalināt otru pacientu.

programme.title: Zīmes
programme.desc: Pensilvānijas štatā kopā ar diviem bērniem un brāli Merilinu pavisam mierīgi, neviena netraucēts, dzīvo fermeris Greiems Hess. Taču šo mieru pārtrauc dīvaini notikumi – vispirms kukurūzas laukos parādās gigantiski apļi, un, iespējams, tos tiešām ir radījušas ārpuszemes civilizācijas. Tad ar viņa tuviniekiem sāk notikt dīvainas lietas. Greiemem ir jātiek skaidrībā ar notiekošo, pirms viņa pasaule nav sabrukusi pavisam.

programme.title: Eleonoras rigbijas pazušana
programme.desc: Konors un Eleonora dzīvo Manhetenā. Viņi ir precējušies vairākus gadus, tomēr joprojām ir ļoti dažādi. Viņam pieder neliels restorāns. Viņas ģimene (tēvs profesors un māte vijolniece) savulaik ne sevišķi atbalstīja meitas izvēli. Konora tēvu dēla dzīve neinteresē vispār. Konora un Eleonoras dzīvē tam visam nav nekādas nozīmes, jo viņi ir radījuši savu mīlestības pilno pasauli. Dramatiski notikumi sagrauj rūpīgi radīto pasaulīti un Eleonora nolemj… izgaist…

programme.title: Džūlī un Džūlija
programme.desc: Nora Efrona ekranizē Džūlī Pauelas autobiogrāfisko grāmatu "Džulī un Džūlija". Pavāre amatiere Džulī Pauela izlemj pagatavot visus slavenās šefpavāres Dzūlijas Čaildas (Merila Strīpa) pavārgrāmatā iekļautos ēdienus. Šo procesu gada garumā viņa apraksta savā blogā.

programme.title: Pajumte
programme.desc: Hanna un Tarihs, būdami bez pajumtes Ņujorkā, iemīlas viens otrā. Filma stāsta par to, kā viņi nonākuši līdz ielai, un, uzzinot par abu pagātni, kļūst skaidrs, ka, lai veidotu nākotni, abiem ir vajadzīgs otrs.

programme.title: Vai spēsi man kādreiz piedot?
programme.desc: Lī Israela pagājušā gadsimta 70. un 80. gados karjeru veidoja, profilējot slavenības, piemēram, Ketrinu Hepbērnu, Estē Lauderu vai žurnālisti Dorotiju Kilgalenu. Kad viņa to vairs nespēja, jo bija zaudējusi ķērienu mainīgās gaumes dēļ, viņa, lojālā drauga Džeka mudināta, pievēršas maldināšanai.

programme.title: Neatklātie ieraksti
programme.desc: Rozannai jeb Rozai pēc 50 gadiem ir jāpamet psihiatriskā klīnika, ko sieviete sauc par mājām visus šos gadus. Roza atsakās vietu pamest. Kad pie viņas ierodas ārsts Viljams Grīns, viņš uzzina, ka Roza piekopj savādus ikdienas rituālus un ilgus gadus rakstījusi dienasgrāmatu ar kodētiem ierakstiem. Jaunā Roza Otrā pasaules kara laikā ir zaudējusi savu māti un negaidīti iemīlas lidotājā. Tomēr Rozu pašu nolūkojis vietējais priesteris. Savstarpējās attiecības kļūst sarežģītas. Pēc daudziem gadiem slēptā patiesība pamazām atklājas Rozas dienasgrāmatu ierakstos. Galvenās lomas atveidotāja ir Rūnija Mara, amerikāņu aktrise, divu "Oskara" balvu nominante, arī viņas māsa Keita Mara ir aktrise un popularitāti guva ar Zojas lomu politiskajā detektīvseriālā "Kāršu namiņš" kopā ar Kevinu Speisiju un Robinu Raitu. Rūnija Mara atveidojusi lomas tādās filmās kā "Meitene ar pūķa tetovējumu", "Blakusefekts", "Kerola". Īru režisors Džims Šeridans ir veidojis tādas filmas kā "Mana kreisā kāja", "Brāļi", "Bokseris". Karjeras laikā nominēts sešiem "Oskariem" kā labākais režisors un scenārija autors. Lomās: Rūnija Mara, Vanesa Redgreiva, Teo Džeimss, Eidans Tērners, un citi. Rež: Džims Šeridans

programme.title: 7 dienas un 7 naktis ar Merilinu Monro
programme.desc: Sera Lorensa Olivjē darbinieks Kolins Klarks dokumentē saspringto Olivjē un Merilinas Monro mijiedarbību filmas "Princis un šovmeitene" (1957) producēšanas laikā.

programme.title: Sauc mani savā vārdā
programme.desc: Ir 1983. gada vasara. 17 gadus vecais Elio Perlmans laiski pavada laiku ģimenes senatnīgajā villā Itālijas ziemeļos, transkribējot mūziku un flirtējot ar draudzeni Marciju. Kādu dienu no Amerikas ierodas 24 gadus vecais doktorantūras students Olivers, kurš kļūst par Elio tēva, ievērojama seno grieķu un romiešu kultūras pētnieka, asistentu. Pamazām Elio un Olivers apjauš, ka šī vasara neatgriezeniski izmainīs viņu dzīves Filma uzņemta pēc Andrē Asimana tāda paša nosaukuma romāna motīviem. Tā saņēma trīs Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas balvas nominācijas un "Oskaru" par labāko adaptēto scenāriju.

programme.title: Valdības noslēpumi
programme.desc: Keira Naitlija un Ralfs Fainss trillerī uz patiesiem notikumiem. Ir 2003. gads. ASV un britu politiķi debatē par Irākas masu iznīcināšanas ieročiem, to specdienesti tikmēr aktīvi strādā, lai izplatītu nepatiesu informāciju, kas pamatotu iebrukumu šajā valstī. Britu aģente nostājas pret savu valsti, lai atklātu patiesību sabiedrībai par ASV slepenās organizācijas NSA nelegālām darbībām, lai sankcionētu iebrukumu Irākā.

programme.title: Ofēlija
programme.desc: Filmā "Ofēlija", kas veidota pēc Lisas Klainas romāna, Ofēlija, slavenā Šekspīra lugas "Hamlets" varone, vēsta savu versiju par to, kā patiesībā risinājās lugā aprakstītie notikumi. Ofēliju, dumpīgo, bez mātes augušo meiteni, pieņem audzināšanā karaliene Ģertrūde. Viņā iemīlas Ģertrūdes dēls princis Hamlets, un viņi slepus apprecas laikā, kad Dānijas karaļvalsti apdraud norvēģu iebrukums un galma iekšienē vērptās intrigas. Ofēlijai un Hamletam ir jāizvēlas starp mīlestību un atriebības alkām.

programme.title: Ofēlija
programme.desc: Filmā "Ofēlija", kas veidota pēc Lisas Klainas romāna, Ofēlija, slavenā Šekspīra lugas "Hamlets" varone, vēsta savu versiju par to, kā patiesībā risinājās lugā aprakstītie notikumi. Ofēliju, dumpīgo, bez mātes augušo meiteni, pieņem audzināšanā karaliene Ģertrūde. Viņā iemīlas Ģertrūdes dēls princis Hamlets, un viņi slepus apprecas laikā, kad Dānijas karaļvalsti apdraud norvēģu iebrukums un galma iekšienē vērptās intrigas. Ofēlijai un Hamletam ir jāizvēlas starp mīlestību un atriebības alkām.

programme.title: Valdības noslēpumi
programme.desc: Keira Naitlija un Ralfs Fainss trillerī uz patiesiem notikumiem. Ir 2003. gads. ASV un britu politiķi debatē par Irākas masu iznīcināšanas ieročiem, to specdienesti tikmēr aktīvi strādā, lai izplatītu nepatiesu informāciju, kas pamatotu iebrukumu šajā valstī. Britu aģente nostājas pret savu valsti, lai atklātu patiesību sabiedrībai par ASV slepenās organizācijas NSA nelegālām darbībām, lai sankcionētu iebrukumu Irākā.

programme.title: Sauc mani savā vārdā
programme.desc: Ir 1983. gada vasara. 17 gadus vecais Elio Perlmans laiski pavada laiku ģimenes senatnīgajā villā Itālijas ziemeļos, transkribējot mūziku un flirtējot ar draudzeni Marciju. Kādu dienu no Amerikas ierodas 24 gadus vecais doktorantūras students Olivers, kurš kļūst par Elio tēva, ievērojama seno grieķu un romiešu kultūras pētnieka, asistentu. Pamazām Elio un Olivers apjauš, ka šī vasara neatgriezeniski izmainīs viņu dzīves Filma uzņemta pēc Andrē Asimana tāda paša nosaukuma romāna motīviem. Tā saņēma trīs Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas balvas nominācijas un "Oskaru" par labāko adaptēto scenāriju.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: The Elf on the Shelf: Sweet Showdown
programme.desc: Its Not Goodbye Forever. The Scout Elves fly over their favourite places as they return home, so the finalists "elf-ify" a famous landmark for a chance to win 25,000 dollars!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Holiday Wars
programme.desc: Hosted by Jonathan Bennett, Holiday Wars is a creative game show where three teams of confectionary connoisseurs demonstrate their astonishing talents by crafting mind-boggling, edible displays. With revered pastry chef Shinmin Li serving as the shows judge, the teams must whip up a display worthy of her immaculate standards if they wish to be crowned the winner. Each episode presents new holiday-themed challenges for the teams to complete, as they use their culinary prowess to produce mesmerising, delicious displays.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Strawberry Pie In The Sky. Strawberries steal the show when Michael Symon makes spatchcock chicken and strawberry salad. Plus, Liz puts together a fresh strawberry pie.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: NOLA Beignet Dream. Michael Symon answers The Big Easys call with some New Orleans-style gumbo and chocolatey beignets. Liz sweetens the deal with a Sazerac.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Everythings Better With Feta. Michael Symon honours his Greek roots as he grills up spanakopita and tahini-dipped summer vegetables. Liz complements dinner with an ouzo cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 7. Cooking show.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Holiday Wars
programme.desc: Hosted by Jonathan Bennett, Holiday Wars is a creative game show where three teams of confectionary connoisseurs demonstrate their astonishing talents by crafting mind-boggling, edible displays. With revered pastry chef Shinmin Li serving as the shows judge, the teams must whip up a display worthy of her immaculate standards if they wish to be crowned the winner. Each episode presents new holiday-themed challenges for the teams to complete, as they use their culinary prowess to produce mesmerising, delicious displays.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Cake Boss

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home For the Holidays
programme.desc: Selena Gomez rings in the new year with Chef Eric Adjepong. Selenas skills are tested as she tackles shrimp and banana grits, scallop benedict, and malva pudding.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Grēku atlaišana
programme.desc: Novecojošs gangsteris cenšas sakārtot savu dzīvi un izlīgt ar pagātni.

programme.title: Sarkanā Džoana
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par krievu spiedzi, kas novērsa Trešo Pasaules karu. Britu izlūkdienests ilgus gadus centās viņu atklāt, viņas vārds kļuva par leģendu. Tomēr par šo viņas varoņdarbu sabiedrība uzzināja pavisam nesen, kad lietai tika noņemts slepenības grifs.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no Kentervila lāsta. Kad šajā savrupmājā ievācas kāda amerikāņu ģimene, spokam parādās cerību stariņš beidzot tapt atbrīvotam.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 2: atkusnis
programme.desc: Laika ziņas: Tuvākās piecas dienas ir gaidāmi lieli plūdi, kam sekos pasaules gals. Iespējams, nedēļas beigās varētu izlauzties kāds saules stariņš… Mamutam Manijam, sliņķim Sidam, zobenzobu tīģerim Djego, zobenzobu vāverei Skratam un pārējiem Ledus laikmeta iemītniekiem ir sajūta, ka viņu kūstošā pasaule sāk palikt pārāk slapja un ledus kalns, kas apdraud ieleju, tūlīt lūzīs. Taču tā nav vienīgā problēma – Manijs vairs nevēlas būt viens pats, taču ir pamatotas aizdomas, ka viņš ir pēdējais mamuts. Atkal ir jādodas ceļā, kur tiek satikta valdzinoša mamutiene (iespējams, pēdējā visā pasaulē) Elija, kuru pavada uzņēmīgs oposumu pārītis Krešs un Edijs.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs — ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Padibenes
programme.desc: Kādreizējais kriminālnoziedznieks atkal sastopas ar savu pagātni, kad viņa mierīgajā un savrupajā dzīvē ierodas bijusī sieva un citi radi.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Mirušie nesāpina
programme.desc: Divi pionieri Amerikas pilsoņu kara laikā frontē cīnās par savu dzīvību un mīlestību.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Bezrūpīgā brunču mednieka Semjuela dzīvē viss ir vienkārši un viegli, taču kādā jaukā dienā ar mazuli uz rokām uzrodas viena no viņa neskaitāmajām draudzenēm Kristīna. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir viņa meita, Kristīna aizlido uz Londonu, atstājot Semu vienu ar bērniņu. Pēkšņi par tēvu kļuvušais Sems, vēl neatguvies no šoka, kopā ar mazulīti lido uz Angliju cerībā uzmeklēt meitenītes māti. Tā kā meklējumi ir nesekmīgi, Semam atliek vien samierināties ar jauno tēva lomu un vienam audzināt meitu. Taču pēc astoņiem gadiem meitenītes māte tomēr uzrodas….

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs — ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas mazulis
programme.desc: Bridžitai Džounsai (Renē Zelvēgere) paliek 43 gadi, un viņas māte Pamela (Džemma Džounsa) atgādina, ka bioloģiskais pulkstenis tikšķ. Apmeklējot kāda drauga bēres, kurš gājis bojā lidmašīnas katastrofā, viņa satiek savu bijušo – Marku Darsiju (Kolins Fērts), kurš ir kopā ar sievu Kamillu (Agni Skota). Pēc bēru ceremonijas viņa dodas uz pašreizējo darbu, kurā strādā par draudzenes un TV diktores Mirandas (Sāra Solemani) producenti. Viņa uzaicina Bridžitu nosvinēt neseno dzimšanas dienu, taču Bridžita atsaka, jo grasās to svinēt ar draugiem. Taču viņa paliek viena, jo visi draugi ir aizņemti ar saviem bērniem. Viņa bēdīga pieņem Mirandas piedāvājumu, un abas dodas uz mūzikas festivālu. Nepaiet ilgs laiks, līdz Bridžita ar seju iekrīt dubļos, taču viņai palīdz glīts svešinieks. Vēlāk festivāla laikā viņa piedzeras un nokļūst nepareizajā teltī, pārsteigta satiekot vīrieti, kurš viņai palīdzēja. Viņiem ir sekss. Nākamajā rītā viņa klusām aizlavās. Bridžita dodas uz kristībām, kurās viņa ir krustmāte un Marks ir krusttēvs. Viņš atklāj Bridžitai, ka šķirsies ar Kamillu. Viņiem ir sekss. Tad viņa atceras, ka viņš vienmēr darbu vērtēja augstāk par abu attiecībām, un no rīta klusām aizlavās, pirms viņš ir pamodies. Kad Bridžita pamana, ka pieņemas svarā, viņas draudzene Šazera (Sallija Filipsa) pārliecina veikt grūtniecības testu. Tests ir pozitīvs. Strādājot pie raidījuma, viņa pamana svešinieku no festivāla un pārsteigta uzzina, ka viņš ir miljardieris Džeks Kvants (Patriks Dempsijs). Viņa tam atklāj, ka ir stāvoklī. Neskatoties uz sākotnējo šoku, Džeks apsola viņu atbalstīt. To pašu pasaka Markam, kurš ir sajūsmā, ka kļūs par tēvu. Bridžita uzaicina Džeku uz pasākumu, un atklāj, ka tajā piedalās arī Marks. Abi vīrieši labi saprotas, un viņi visi kopā dodas vakariņās. Viņa atklāj, ka jebkurš no tiem var būt tēvs. Džeks to uztver labi, taču Marks aiziet. Mēnešiem ritot, Marks atjauno sakarus. Kļūdas dēļ Bridžita pamet darbu. Kā bezdarbniece viņa nomākta klīst pa lietu...

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi Džons Makleins nonāk svešā teritorijā, kad ierodas Maskavā palīdzēt savam ietiepīgajam dēlam Džekam, nezinot, ka patiesībā dēls ir lieliski sagatavots CIP darbinieks, kuram jāaptur kodolieroču zādzība. Cīnoties ar krievu noziedzniekiem un cenšoties novērst kara sākumu, abi Makleini atklāj, ka viņu atšķirīgās darba metodes padara viņus par neapturamiem varoņiem.

programme.title: Mēs visi svešinieki
programme.desc: Šajā aizkustinošajā, provokatīvajā stāstā par mīlestību, ģimeni un pagātnes rēgiem Ādams dzīvo vientuļu dzīvi, taču kādu vakaru viņu apciemo noslēpumains kaimiņš, kurš uzjundī sen apspiestas jūtas un atmiņas. Abu starpā rodas saikne un nenoliedzamas simpātijas, un Ādams nonāk savā bērnības mājā, kurā 30 gadus pēc nāves šķietami dzīvo viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Atzīstiet manu vainu
programme.desc: Kad policijai beidzot izdodas arestēt divdesmit Lukēzi mafijas klana locekļus, Džekijs Dinoršio, ar iesauku Resnais, kurš jau izcieš 30 gadu cietumsodu, saņem vilinošu piedāvājumu – Džekiju atbrīvos priekšlaicīgi, ja viņš liecinās pret saviem draugiem. Bet Resnais Di nav nodevējs! Tiesas procesā, kas izrādīsies garākais un skandalozākais ASV tiesu praksē, Džekijs sevi aizstāvēs pats.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Virtus Bologna - Dubai Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Betis - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: NBA. Brooklyn Nets - New Orleans Pelicans
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: UFC. Laika atskaite. Merab Dvalishvili-Petr Yan
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: UFC 323: Merab Dvalishvili vs Petr Yan
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Koln - St. Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. programme.title: EuroLeague. Baskonia Vitoria-Gasteiz - EA7 Emporio Armani Milan
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Fight Night
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Teniss: Žurnāls. ATP Tour This Week. 47. raidījums
Teniss: Vimbldona. Filma
programme.desc: Wimbledon is more than just a tennis tournament — its a summer tradition, a slice of British culture, and one of the most iconic sporting events in the world. Held every year in London, England, usually in late June to early July, its where the best tennis players on the planet come to battle it out on the famous grass courts of the All England Club. Its actually the oldest tennis tournament in the world, dating back to 1877, and its still the only Grand Slam played on grass — the fastest and most unpredictable surface. Thats part of what makes it so exciting. Matches are intense, fast-paced, and full of surprises. Wimbledon is packed with unique traditions that make it stand out. Players are required to wear all white on court — no exceptions. The crowd enjoys strawberries and cream, and you wont see flashy ads around the court — its all about the game. And of course, theres the Royal Box, where you might spot celebrities or even members of the British Royal Family watching the action. From rising stars to tennis legends, everyone dreams of lifting the famous Wimbledon trophy. Theres something magical about seeing players walk onto Centre Court, hearing the roar of the crowd, and witnessing moments that go down in sports history. Whether youre a tennis fan or just love great sports drama, Wimbledon is a must-watch — classy, thrilling, and full of unforgettable moments.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Betis - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC. Merab Dvalishvili-Petr Yan
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn buy their third house on the same block in Kaneohe. Its full of junk with a jungle backyard and in worse shape than they thought.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew take on two couples pooling their money for a shared California property. Plus, a single woman is ready to put down roots in Arizona.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: A newly blended family calls on Izzy to remodel their water damaged home, and they need to meet a tight deadline to host their wedding reception.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt

With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple from Missouri looks for a two-bedroom home with a pool, space for a boat and views. Can they get all those things without breaking the bank?

programme.title: Boise Boys
programme.desc: American reality series following expert renovators Clint Robertson and Luke Caldwell as they transform houses in Boise, Idaho. The pair of best friends make a formidable team, even if they have completely different personalities and outlooks, and they use their skills and experience to flip houses and make a profit. Through their company, Timber and Love, they aim to promote the use of timber in home renovations. With hugely contrasting styles, they get the job done with a little arguing and a lot of hard work, ensuring these homes look better than ever.
