Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vientuļniekvēzīti Šelliju, kura pazaudējusi savu čaulu un paslēpjas Zābaciņa zābakā. Dora dodas meklēt Šellijas mitekli. Tētis rīko kesadilju pikniku, bet ir aizmirsis mājās visas sastāvdaļas! Dora apņemas tās aizgādāt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atklāj, ka Karija kunga atvaļinājuma laikā ir laistījis aplamu augu. Brauna kundze grib, lai Vindzoras dārzi mākslinieciski izpaužas. Padingtons nezina, kas ir māksla, tāpēc izlemj noskaidrot, kas viņam padodas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons nejauši iznīcina vāveres riekstu krātuvi, tāpēc ielūdz savvaļas dzīvnieku dzīvot mājā. Džūdijai uzdāvina spiegošanas komplektu, Bērdas kundze sāk aizdomīgi izturēties, tāpēc bērni un Padingtons izseko viņu ar spiegu rīkiem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: Ķepu patruļa ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā,

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: As the Midknights sail across the sea on their latest quest, Max realizes the gang might be a little rusty. Kevyn and Millie arent seeing eye to eye, Simon is preoccupied helping his animal clients from long distance, and Uncle Budrick is terribly seasick! However, Max is certain she can get them working as a team. But when Uncle Budrick is spooked by something sinister in the shadows below deck, he is convinced he saw a ghost! Determined to get back on mission, Max leads the charge to search the ship and find whatever mysterious presence might be haunting them. They soon find theres no ghost at all-theyve been spooked by a stowaway, the former King of Byjovia, Gastley! But as the Midknights are distracted, the ship veers off course and into a powerful storm! They quickly realize they must act as a team in order to steady the ship before it capsizes! Meanwhile, back in Byjovia, Mumblin fears someone might be behind his recent spate of accidents, and takes matters into his own hands...

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Granny Tentacles goes out for a spa day, Patrick volunteers to watch over her house. In a failed attempt to follow Grannys instructions, Patrick makes his way into her home, then brings Squidina inside too. Between breaking Grannys furniture, tearing out her toilet, and letting a wild animal out of its cage, Patrick destroys the entire house, just as Granny returns home to witness it. // Without seeing him, the Star family obliviously smashes up Plankton, leading him to forget who he is. When the injured, amnesic Plankton is saved and adopted by the Dartfish family, it does not take long for him to teach the overly polite family his evil ways. Meanwhile, Karen searches all over town for her missing husband.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe has been absent from school while on missions with her siblings, and is assigned summer school to make up her missing work. Max thinks its hilarious that she will have to spend the summer in school, until he is also informed that he will be the teacher. While they both pout about having to be in class all summer, Phoebe goes solo on some superhero mission. When a couple villains get the upper hand, a mysterious new superhero names Captain Perfect arrives to rescue her. Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark
programme.desc: Over the years, the Maltos and the Autobots have vanquished foes and protected Earth from destruction, but some victories have come at a tragic cost... Now, some are painting the heroes as villains and the Maltos must face those consequences. Even though Robbys powers give him status amongst his peers and purpose in his community, when hes caught abusing his power, hes unwittingly proving his detractors right. Sensing something is wrong, Mo and "Detective" Thrash team up to prove their brother was set up. Meanwhile, Twitch obsesses over mistakes shes made in the past and she becomes her own worst enemy. Still, the Maltos and the Autobots rally to battle enemies who will stop at nothing to destroy them - and other worlds. Twitch fails her team when they need her the most, and Robby cant be there for his sister to lean on. Luckily, an old ally arrives in in time to help. In the end, the heroes unite and end the fight, but the Maltos may never be the same again.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: On their way back from Lake World, the Wylde Paks get stuck in a massive traffic jam. The situation gets so dire that all the drivers have no choice but to set up camp - a camp that quickly turns into its own, self-governing, rudimentary society. Struggling with a vacuum of power, Jack is chosen as their reluctant leader, but hes determined to usher them into peace. Meanwhile, Lily catches feelings for a boy in a nearby car, but because the boys dad and Will have serious road rage beef, their romance is forbidden. // Desperate to leave their mark on Canyon Valley, Jack and Lily set out to capture the great beast of Canyon Valley Lake - a giant fish that has menaced the town for years. After being swallowed whole multiple times, Lily and Jack realize they must take a different approach, but then they hear horror stories from other townsfolk about their own run-ins with the giant fish proving that bagging the beast is an impossible task. Despite all this, Lily and Jack attempt to accomplish the impossible.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Jack finally gets a phone, his first text (a joke about Will) goes to the family group chat instead of Lily! This forces the kids to follow their dad through town without him knowing, in an attempt to delete the message before he has a chance to read it, and puts them in situations so awkward and uncomfortable that Jack will forever think twice before hitting "send" again. // The family discovers there is one more precious hallasand cookie left and agree to share it, but before they can, it suddenly goes missing. All fingers point to Halmoni, and the family calls an emergency family tribunal to prove her guilt or her innocence. Each family member has their own recounting of the day leading up to the theft, and each story is wildly different.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark
programme.desc: Over the years, the Maltos and the Autobots have vanquished foes and protected Earth from destruction, but some victories have come at a tragic cost... Now, some are painting the heroes as villains and the Maltos must face those consequences. Sensing something is wrong, Mo and "Detective" Thrash team up to prove their brother was set up. Meanwhile, Twitch obsesses over mistakes shes made in the past and she becomes her own worst enemy. In the end, the heroes unite and end the fight, but the Maltos may never be the same again.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is bitten by DoodleBob while studying for an exam. SpongeBob shrugs it off, mistaking it for a papercut. But under the moonlight, SpongeBob turns into a mischievous creature called the WereDoodle! As the WereDoodle, he wreaks havoc all over town, doodling on everything. Mr. Krabs leads a hunt to end the chaos, but DoodleBob arrives to apologize for WereDoodles wrongdoings and lift the curse... until Mr. Krabs gets a papercut and becomes the new WereDoodle! // Its gorilla suit day! To celebrate, SpongeBob dresses up in a gorilla suit with Patrick dressed as his handler. As they run around town, people mistake SpongeBob for a real gorilla, causing panic that leads to SpongeBob being taken off to the zoo. Meanwhile, an actual gorilla escapes the zoo, running around town causing even more havoc. The mix-up is eventually cleared-just in time for Squidward to have one final run-in with another gorilla.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: When the Midknights ship is set off course, the team must survive treacherous new waters. Before Max can enact her plan, she is summoned to Wizard Court where Mumblin is on trial for his life. Max must help Mumblin prove that he is a good wizard and that he escaped the afterlife to help the Midknights defeat Fendra. If Max cant, Mumblin will be sent away for good. Max calls on the Midknights to testify on Mumblins behalf. When those attempts fail, Max takes the stand. At first, Maxs emotional testimony seems to win over the court, but her pleas for Mumblins freedom backfire and Mumblin is ultimately found guilty. Luckily, Kevyn discovers a way to save Mumblin. Max must battle the Worms of Justice and if she wins, then Mumblin will be set free. Transported to a desert, Max battles giant worms. In the end, Max defeats the worms and Mumblin wins his trial. Unfortunately, the Midknights are sent back to their boat, which is headed straight for a massive waterfall!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its time for the Great Smurf Games in the village! The big prize? A magical sphere that grants all the members of the winning team one wish of their choice. Clumsy sees this as the perfect opportunity to become Agile Smurf, but no one wants to team up with him. Gargamel is also looking forward to the games because he wants to use the sphere to capture all the Smurfs! Hes well prepared and has set up traps all over the forest. The Great Games start with the traditional relay race. During the race, Storm and Grouchy are captured by Gargamel, who learns that only one Smurf who wins the Great Games will get a wish. So, he decides to send Dwayne and Rowena to take part in the Games, disguised as Storm and Grouchy. They go looking for the magical sphere, that has now been taken by Clumsy. They offer to team up with him, to his great surprise...

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lily and Jack keep neglecting their chores. Which wouldnt normally be a problem except that Canyon Valleys business inspector is on her way to the Groom and Board, and the kids forgot to plunge the sink in the trailer. Will and Lil are tasked with cleaning up the trailer while Min and Jack rush off to the hardware store to buy a piece of pipe. But things go bad to worse as Will and Lil keep finding more problems to deal with in the trailer and Min and Jack must stall the Inspectors arrival. // Chuck announces his newest hustle: a sleepaway theatre camp! Knowing it must be a scam, Jack and Lil are eager to revel in the chaos. The "cabaret acts" include strange chanting, weird cat noises, and Halmoni (a kid at heart). But when they discover that its not JUST a scam to Chuck but in fact his lifes dream, they must save the show and the theater from destruction!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Halmoni develops a special connection with a dog, Tofu, at the Groom and Board. When its time to return the freshly-groomed pup to his owners, she makes a split decision to go on the run with him instead! Min and Will must distract Tofus owners with runaway chicks while Lil and Jack go looking for Halmoni. They discover that Tofu resembles Halmonis beloved childhood dog, Dubu, whom she had to leave behind in Korea. Can they rescue Tofu - and will Halmoni get to say her proper goodbye? // Eager to prove himself, Jack volunteers to run the Groom and Board alone for the day. Its supposed to be a chill day with no appointments - but the phone wont stop ringing! Unable to say no, Jack ends up taking in a chaotic giant snake, and multiple smaller pets - whom the snake sees as her dinner. Jack struggles to protect the little pets (and Halmoni) from the jaws of death.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Mrs. Wong arrives in town and when she discovers that Max and Phoebe are secretly on an undercover mission, she threatens to expose their superhero identities to the town unless they comply with her demands. In an attempt to find leverage against Mrs. Wong, Max and Phoebe turn Dr. Colosso back into a human, hoping he can dig up some dirt on her to stop her threats. However, things take an unexpected turn when Dr. Colosso and Mrs. Wong fall in love and decide to get married. But during the ceremony, when Mrs. Wong and Dr. Colosso both discover that the other is broke, they call off the wedding themselves. Dr. Colosso uses the dirt he gathered on Mrs. Wong to ensure that she keeps Max and Phoebes superhero identities a secret. Booch and Jinx are determined to uncover the identity of the superhero they spotted at the summer school dance. Chloe tries to dissuade them, but when they discover a mask and cape in Principal Fergusons bag, Booch and Jinx are convinced theyve found a real superhero.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark
programme.desc: Over the years, the Maltos and the Autobots have vanquished foes and protected Earth from destruction, but some victories have come at a tragic cost... Now, some are painting the heroes as villains and the Maltos must face those consequences. Even though Robbys powers give him status amongst his peers and purpose in his community, when hes caught abusing his power, hes unwittingly proving his detractors right. Sensing something is wrong, Mo and "Detective" Thrash team up to prove their brother was set up. Meanwhile, Twitch obsesses over mistakes shes made in the past and she becomes her own worst enemy. Still, the Maltos and the Autobots rally to battle enemies who will stop at nothing to destroy them - and other worlds. Twitch fails her team when they need her the most, and Robby cant be there for his sister to lean on. Luckily, an old ally arrives in in time to help. In the end, the heroes unite and end the fight, but the Maltos may never be the same again.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of SpongeBobs chaotic driving, Mrs. Puff sends him away to Klopnod on an exchange student driver program. In return, she receives Peppercorn, a sea-mule, who is an excellent driver! Meanwhile, SpongeBob learns that his frenzied driving skills are perfectly suited for the Klopnodian roads (where only farm animals are allowed to drive). However, SpongeBobs newfound Klopnodian driving skills do not translate well upon returning to Bikini Bottom. // Slappy becomes a waiter at the Krusty Krab but scares off customers with his creepy demeanor. He promises Mr. Krabs that his monster friends will be coming to dine that night. Later, the restaurant is packed with monsters and Krabs is thrilled! However, Nosferatu arrives and begs Slappy to return as his servant. Slappy agrees, to Mr. Krabs disappointment - he loved the business the monsters brought in! In the end, however, he realizes that monsters pay in bugs, not cash!

programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.desc: Meteorite and her band are playing a concert to motivate the Smurfs who are picking blueberries, but their concert attracts Gargamel. programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: With only a few weeks left of summer, Lil has a genius idea: the family must visit her favorite theme park, Lake World, before Jack leaves! But when they arrive, its clearly less magical than Lil remembered: the fish dogs are droopy, the coaster aint coastin, the all-you-can-eat shrimp buffet is kaput. Jacks more interested in filming the janky park - frustrating Lil, who wants him to enjoy the day with his eyeballs. She consoles herself that the parks BEST ride will make up for the disappointing day. But when they get to where the ride should be, its gone! Devastated, Lil blames Jack for the horrid day, and they get in a bad fight. Back at the hotel that night, still mad at each other, the kids cant help but piece together clues hinting that the Otter Side might still be in the park... They have to find it! The kids must sneak past vengeful security guards and chaotic mazes to find the mythical ride, leading to an adventure neither of them expected.

Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward is rushed to the hospital when SpongeBob accidentally slams the door on Squidwards face. He undergoes surgery to have his face fixed to look normal again - but things dont go exactly as planned. // A very windy day in Bikini Bottom is blowing air through SpongeBobs holes resulting in a chorus of pretty flute-like sounds. This attracts all the local Jellyfish who love the music coming out of SpongeBob.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: With the team busy training, Jawbreaker feels left out. But when he encounters Aftermath suffering from energy depletion, they accidentally get stuck together! Can they survive each other and what lurks in the wilderness?

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie bottles up their feelings after not making the fearleading team and causes unintended electrical outbursts. After misguided efforts, Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester get too carried away when tasked with commercializing Bettervales most beguiling natural wonder. // Diamondo is used to getting everything he wants, and decides what he wants is a sibling, just like Best and Bester.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that threes a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that theres more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: The Super Duper Bunny League is a team of bunnies who defends the world from a gallery of cartoony villains. From fighting sweet-toothed space pirates to lava monsters, they use their superpowers to protect truth, justice, and free time to chill.

programme.title: Planet Sheen
programme.desc: Ooze on First:Sheen teaches Zeenu his version of baseball. Monster-Fighting Combat Strike Force:Doppys parents fear their son is becoming too courageous when he and Sheen form the Monster-Fighting Combat Strike Force.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Devs dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids wants at the annual Founders Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wandas wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed."

programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: During a visit from Antony, Hazels wish lands them inside "Rattleconda Racers," a board game they invented. Once in the game, however, they bicker about the best way to play. Hazel wants to stick to the rules they used to play by, but Antony wants to make new ones. When the formidable Rhonda the Rattleconda takes off with Cosmo and Wanda, intending to make them her next meal, Hazel and Antony must confront the tension in their relationship to save them and escape the game! // When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland. // After discovering that Patrick never finished behavioral training, the family home-schools him.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester finds that the only way to get her brothers attention when hes glued to the game, is to be in the game. // Best and Bester stage a crazy publicity stunt for Grafifis repair shop which has everyone fearing for their lives.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that threes a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that theres more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Kowalskis obsession with Doris the dolphin drives him to invent a love ray, the Love-U-Laser. It works like a charm until Alice falls for a trashcan, Julien falls for Mort, and Skipper orders the ray to be put in reverse. Private gets hit by the reverse ray and instantly loathes Kowalski. Matters get much worse as the loathe ray explodes and everybody hates Kowalski! Hes only got one shot to stop being the most loathed penguin in the world. // Told as a courtroom flashback, Kowalski unwisely revives Jiggles in a small, whipped cream-eating version. The little green cubes multiply on impact, however, and are soon threatening to cover the surface of the earth. As the Jiggli multiply out of control, will the team be able to prevent the jiggli-fication of the world?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Commissioner flips his lid, literally. His toupee blows off and sticks to Maurice, who also gets red cheeks and a skinned tail, all by accident. Julien and Mort chase him with sticks, intent on beating the "monster" stuck to Maurices head. The baboon ladies take Maurice in, protecting and pampering him because they mistakenly think hes a male baboon. Its up to the penguins to get the toupee back and restore it to its rightful scalp. // Shelly the ostrich gets stuck in drying cement and only Rico can save her. Shelly falls for him hard as a result, however, Ricos heart forever belongs to his doll. Shelly swipes the doll and tries hard to win his heart, but Rico doesnt budge and his doll is accidently hauled off in a recycle truck. The penguins give chase but are left hopelessly in the dust. Shelly, wanting to make amends, tosses them on her back and sprints after the truck - can she possibly catch it?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out. // Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: On a fairy family trip to Fairy World, Dev convinces Hazel to steal Peris wand and explore Fairy World. Cosmo, Wanda and Peri sneak into Jorgens office and use his tracker to find them. Hazel and Dev end up stuck in the Un-Wish Zone, trapped by the Un-wish Dragon. Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out! // When band and orchestra tryouts happen at school, Hazel finds herself stuck in the middle of a rivalry between the two. Rather than choose a side, she wishes to be good at all instruments and ends up in both. Exhausted from the double life shes living, she wishes that the band and orchestra had nothing to be rivals about. In granting the wish, Cosmo and Wanda get rid of all music on Earth. Hazel, with the help of the Nmusic Phairy (silent N), must restore music to Earth and end this rivalry once and for all!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House

Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. These two are match made in heaven as they find themselves in crazy and hilarious situations every day in their home town of Lundgren. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Реальный секс с Юлией Гайворонской
programme.desc: Секс — это единение с любимым человеком и найвысшее наслаждение. Это искусство получать удовольствие, зная своё тело и понимая, что может нравится партнёру. Секс-эксперт Юлия Гайворонская и "Реальный Секс" поможет разобраться вам в тонкостях и многообразии сексуальных игр, развенчает мифы вокруг многих тем и поможет вашему желанию воплотиться в реальность.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Панянка-селянка
programme.desc: По замыслу организаторов шоу в каждом выпуске примут участие 2 девушки: одна холеная и не бедная горожанка, а вторая - простая деревенская девчонка. Одна из них имеет спокойную работу в теплом уютном офисе, зарабатывает неплохие деньги, постоянно следит за своей внешностью и имиджем, все выходные проводит занимаясь шоппингом в крупных торгово-развлекательных центрах или развлекается с подругами в суши-барах, боулинг-клубах или кинотеатрах. Вторая участница - ведет полностью противоположный образ жизни: кормит домашнюю скотину, помогает родителям в огороде, одевается проще некуда, а зарабатывает, в лучшем случае, 1000 грн в сельском гастрономе. И вот такие две абсолютно непохожие девушки из разных миров на целых три дня поменяются местами и жизнями! Именно это и есть цель нового шоу Панянка-Селянка.

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. programme.title: Ментовские войны. Харьков
programme.desc: Продолжение культового сериала на телеканале 2+2 онлайн. Все фанаты криминальных историй смогут увидеть, как будет разворачиваться сюжет в новом городе, с новыми людьми и преступлениями, которые придется раскрывать умным следователем. Особенно трудно им будут даваться дела, в которых замешаны "оборотни в погонах" - сотрудники структур, которые должны защищать граждан, а не наоборот. Телеканал 2+2 онлайн гарантирует, что новый сериал понравится вам еще больше двух предыдущие проекты, действия которых разворачивались в Одессе и Киеве. К тому же, вы сможете испытать свои силы в решение запутанных дел - вдруг, вы поймете, кто именно является преступником, раньше, чем главные герои сериала? Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал".
